exceptions.tactic: intros n r f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m' g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m' g' H H0 H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n r f m g H H0 H1 H2. split. - apply nat_ortho_sum_join. intro i. induction i. + intros j Hj. specialize (H j). lia. + intros j. apply H0. lia. - intros i Hi. apply power_2_inj. specialize (H2 i). apply H2. lia.
